textDetails.negativeText: In my opinion, the breakfast could be improved; there is not enough choice.
textDetails.positiveText: excellent location and beautiful room

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Marco,

Thank you very much for the feedback. We are happy you have enjoyed the location and room :)
We also appreciate the remarks regarding breakfast.

Warm Regards,
Jessica

Dear Terry,

Thank you for sharing your experience. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our location, finding it convenient with easy access to Kensington Gardens, Hyde Park, and nearby cafes and restaurants. It is also great to know that you appreciated our breakfast offerings, including the healthy choices available.

We understand that the room size and breakfast area may not have fully met your expectations, and we appreciate your feedback. Your comments are valuable to us as we strive to provide a comfortable and enjoyable stay for all our guests.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

Best,
Jessica

textDetails.positiveText:
Good location. Well-run hotel. It was nice to have breakfast downstairs, if you wanted. Some healthy choices: oranges, bananas, apples, yogurt, hard-boiled eggs.
You can walk to Kensington Gardens/Hyde Park; really beautiful, natural areas.
Many cafes, restaurants nearby. Buses nearby. Paddington Station not too far.
textDetails.negativeText: Room a bit small. Breakfast a bit cramped at times. A hot ham and cheese would have been nice (but would have to be made in the kitchen).
textDetails.title: I liked the area alot. I would stay again, no doubt.

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Matt,

Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your stay. I am happy you enjoyed our location, found it convenient with multiple tube stations close by, liked the nearby restaurants, and appreciated the quiet of our residential square. I am also glad your room was clean, comfortable enough, and that everything worked smoothly.

I understand the room being small, especially on a budget, can feel limiting and that the stairwell location meant some noise in the mornings. Your feedback is very helpful.

Thank you again for your kind words about our reception team. It is wonderful to hear you felt welcomed and well served.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back on a future visit.

Warm Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.positiveText:
Excellent location, close to several different tube stations for different lines - I mostly used Bayswater and Queensway stations, each quite walkable. Close to many high-street facilities and excellent restaurants (try Sadaf, Persian, excellent food, and just around the corner), but quiet as the hotel itself is in a residential square. The Royal Park Kensington Gardens is about ten minutes' walk away and very pleasant.

Room was small and with basic facilities but you can't expect miracles in London for the price I paid. Room was nice and clean, en suite was small but not as small as some I've seen! Everything worked. Reception friendly and competent. A single passkey works for your room and the front door, no complications.
textDetails.negativeText: Room was on a main stairwell so could be noisy in the mornings, but I was on a tight budget and I imagine there are better rooms in the hotel!

textDetails.positiveText: The hotel is nice and very well located. The neighborhood is charming and there are many markets, stores and restaurants nearby. The staff was so polite and helpful. It was a nice stay.
textDetails.title: A good stay
textDetails.negativeText: The room was a little small and hot.

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Lucia,

Thank you so much for the kind words, we are very happy you have enjoyed the staff and the location.
We hope to welcome you again in the future and offer a better room.

Best Regards
Jessica

textDetails.positiveText: Quiet neighbourhood, yet close to underground and shops
textDetails.title: Great value for money in a lovely London area

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Mariano, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our quiet neighborhood while still being close to the underground and nearby shops. We appreciate your comments and hope to welcome you again soon.

Regards,
Jessica

roomType.name: Single Room with Private External Bathroom

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Susan, 
Thank you for your review. It is wonderful to hear that the location was ideal. Your feedback about the breakfast is noted.

Regards,

textDetails.positiveText: Great location
textDetails.negativeText: Breakfast very basic
textDetails.title: Good

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Pyry, 
Thank you for sharing your experience. It is lovely to hear that the modern room design and caring staff stood out during your stay. Your comments about the towels and breakfast variety are noted, and steps will be taken to improve these areas. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and helps enhance the experience for future guests.

Kind Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.positiveText: Furniture and the look of the room were fresh and modern, staff was wonderful and caring!
textDetails.title: Best hotel from this price category
textDetails.negativeText: The unused towels had some dark hairs from the previos guests. The breakfast could’ve had some more variety. although the things offered were good, there was nothing fresh to put on top of the bread.

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Mark, Thank you for your feedback. It is wonderful to hear that the location and staff made a positive impression. Your comments are much appreciated, and we look forward to welcoming you again.

Best Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.positiveText: Location. Staff.

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Rindala, Thank you for your review. We are pleased that you were happy with the location, cleanliness, and space. We appreciate your feedback regarding the noise from the lift and breakfast, and we will share your comments with our team to help improve these areas. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we hope to welcome you back for an even better stay.

Best,
Jessica

textDetails.title: I recommend Garden Court Hotel for a  stay in a nice friendly neighborhood. Rooms are specious and clean. The staff is r
textDetails.negativeText:
The noise produced by the lift! I was in room 315 it sounded lousy as if it is in the room!!!
And breakfast could be slightly better.
textDetails.positiveText: Location, cleanliness and space.

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Emma, Thank you for sharing your feedback. It is great to hear that you found our front desk team friendly and helpful and that you enjoyed the lovely view of the rear gardens, the convenient location, and the breakfast. We appreciate your comments about the bathroom layout and the window lock, and we will make sure to look into these issues. Your input helps us improve, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

Kind Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.title: Peaceful and cosy, breakfast was a great start to my working day
textDetails.negativeText: I had my own bathroom but it was down stairs from my room - it was difficult to sit on the toilet when the door was closed. The lock on the bedroom window to keep it open wasn't working properly.
textDetails.positiveText: The front desk were friendly and helpful. My room had a nice view onto the rear gardens. Loved the location and closeness to the tube. Breakfast was brilliant!

roomType.name: Single Room with Private External Bathroom
Single Room with Private External Bathroom

textDetails.positiveText: Great little single room with separate shower room, breakfast was plain but plentiful.
textDetails.title: Nice clean hotel in pretty London square minutes from Queensway shops and cafes.
textDetails.negativeText: Didn't mind that  Shower room was separate from  the bedroom but wasn't on the same floor, so little hike in my PJ'S!

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Fiona, Thank you for sharing this review. It is wonderful to hear that the single room felt cozy and the breakfast was plentiful. The note about the separate shower room and the walk between floors is completely understood. Feedback like this helps make future stays even more comfortable and enjoyable.

Kind Regards,
Jessica

Dear Tiina, Thank you for sharing your feedback. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed our friendly staff and convenient location. We are very sorry about the issues you experienced with the battery noise and the initial room odor. We are glad that our team was able to assist you with an upgraded room, and we appreciate your understanding. Your comments help us improve, and we hope to welcome you again for a smoother and more comfortable stay.

Kind Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.negativeText: Battery made loud noises. First room smelled bad, but we changed it wit upgrade (fee applied)
textDetails.positiveText: Nice staff and nice location
textDetails.title: Ok stay with nice location

textDetails.negativeText: Unfortunately the lift was broken and I was on the fourth floor
textDetails.title: Great value, comfortable and good breakfast
textDetails.positiveText: Convenient as close to two train stations. Comfortable and staff were great

partnerReply.reply:
Dear John, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are very happy to hear that you found our location convenient, your room comfortable, and our staff great. We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused by the lift being out of order during your stay, especially as your room was on the fourth floor. We appreciate your understanding and patience, and we hope to welcome you again soon for an even more comfortable experience.

Best Regards,
Jessica

Dear Olga,

Thank you so much for sharing your detailed feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location, the peaceful surroundings at night, and the helpfulness of our staff. It is great to know that you found good value in your stay and appreciated the room amenities like the kettle. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused by the lift being out of service and appreciate your understanding and good humour about the extra exercise. Your suggestions regarding the trash bin, mini fridge, and additional shelving are very helpful and will be taken into consideration for future improvements. We truly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Kind Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.negativeText:
Our room was on a steep 4th floor and the lift was broken throughout our stay. Climbing the stairs after full day of exploration was tiring though it contributed to our fitness state. 
As there is no daily cleaning (available on request), it would be great to have another trash bin, one tiny trash bin that is not emptied daily is not enough. It would also be great to have a mini fridge or more shelves in the room but it was a minor inconvenience. 
Overall I think the hotel was a great value for money and I definitely recommend it.
textDetails.positiveText: The hotel is very centrally located, 5 min walk to 2 metro stations, multiple super markets and restaurants in a vicinity, walking distance to Hyde park. We enjoyed the great location while the street was quiet at night. The room and bathroom were small but functional. We loved having a kettle in the room. The staff was helpful.
textDetails.title: Great location and good value for money
Great stay, cozy and friendly place
textDetails.positiveText: Staff was super friendly, room was small but cozy, it has everything you need for a good stay at London, right in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods.

roomType.name: Single Room with Private External Bathroom

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Beatriz, Thank you for your lovely feedback. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciated the cosy room and friendly staff. It is great to know you liked the neighbourhood and found everything you needed for a comfortable visit to London.

Kind Regards,
Jessica

Dear Chrys, Thank you for sharing your feedback. We are glad you found the location convenient and the breakfast sufficient. We appreciate your comments about the room, bathroom, dining area, and coffee service, and will take them into consideration to improve future stays.

Best Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.title: Good enough but basic
textDetails.positiveText: Location is very convenient, close to subway. Breakfast was basic and enough. Decent hotel for basic needs.
textDetails.negativeText: The room for single person was small and the bathroom was even smaller. The dining room was also small space. It seems the building was a private house before, made to function as a hotel. And I would have liked to have more coffee without having to ask for it each time.
No Bar area.
textDetails.positiveText: Close to the underground.
textDetails.title: Clean and tidy. More than enough for a business trip.

partnerReply.reply: Dear Donovan, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you appreciated our convenient location near the underground. We understand your comment regarding the absence of a bar area. Your suggestion is valuable, and we will take it into consideration as we continue to improve our guest experience. We hope to welcome you again in the future. Thank you. Best Regards, Anuja

Dear Marie,

Thank you for sharing your feedback. We are pleased that the larger room and bed made your stay comfortable and that the location met your expectations. We also acknowledge your note about the smaller size of the rooms and bathrooms. We value all guest comments and use them to continue enhancing the experience for future visitors. We look forward to welcoming you again.

Kind Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.negativeText: Rooms and bathrooms are on the smaller side.
textDetails.positiveText: Opted for a larger bed/room even and it was a lot more comfortable for a solo traveller. The location was also excellent.
textDetails.title: Excellent location and lovely staff!

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Marie, Thank you for sharing your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you found the location convenient and our staff helpful. We also appreciate your comments regarding the size of the room and shower. Guest comfort is important to us, and we take all feedback into consideration as we continue to improve. We hope to welcome you again in the future.

Best Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.title: Comfortable and great location!
textDetails.positiveText: The location and the staff were lovely and helpful.
textDetails.negativeText: The room and shower very small.
Lift - didn’t work
textDetails.title: Nice location

textDetails.negativeText: Lift was sketchy when we were on it, then stopped working later on in the night
textDetails.title: Convenient
textDetails.positiveText: Location was great

textDetails.negativeText: Room very warm - unable to turn radiators down. Noisiest shower ever! Two twin beds pushed together was fine, but duvet didn't fit the new layout! Continental breakfast was not 'exquisite' as advertised.... Very basic. Small dining room which gets very busy.
textDetails.positiveText: Lovely quiet location. Short distance from tube station. Easy check-in. Average value for money.

partnerReply.reply: Dear Robert, Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback. We are glad you enjoyed the quiet location, proximity to the tube station, and smooth check-in. We apologize for the issues with the room temperature, noisy shower, and the twin bed arrangement. We also appreciate your comments on the breakfast and dining area and will review them to see where improvements can be made. Your feedback helps us provide a better experience for future guests. Thank you. Best Regards, Anuja

textDetails.negativeText: There was a lot of noise coming from the room above and next to us at night.

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Maria, Thank you for your kind review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and found our staff friendly. We appreciate your feedback about the bedroom temperature and size, and we will take this into consideration. Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Best Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.negativeText: The bedroom was a bit tight and sometimes too hot, even with the heating off. Other than that, would recommend anytime!
textDetails.positiveText: Great location and nice staff

roomType.name: Single Room with Private External Bathroom

textDetails.title: Generally really good hotel, if you are there to explore the city
textDetails.positiveText: Great location, friendly staff, generally clean
textDetails.negativeText: There could be more attention to detail in terms of cleanliness, dust in the corners etc, fire alarm went off quite often and once at night which was not pleasant even though we were told it was for testing purposes, slow wifi

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Radvile, Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our great location, friendly staff, and that the hotel was generally clean.

We are sorry that some areas did not meet your expectations in terms of attention to detail and that the fire alarm caused disruption during your stay. We will review these issues with our team to ensure they are addressed and that future guests experience a more comfortable stay. We also apologise for the slow Wi-Fi and will look into improving this.

We truly appreciate your comments as they help us improve, and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Best,
Jessica

Dear House, Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. We are pleased to know that you found the location convenient and that our team members were friendly and helpful. It is also wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our facilities.

We are sincerely sorry for the inconvenience caused by the fire alarm sounding during your stay. We understand how unsettling this must have been and we regret that there was no clear communication at the time. Please be assured that we are reviewing this matter with our team so that future announcements are delivered promptly and clearly for the comfort and safety of all guests.

We truly appreciate your comments and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again.

Best Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.negativeText: The fire alarm rang twice 26/11/25, and neither time was there an announcement to the rest of the occupants whether or not it was a false alarm or real.
textDetails.positiveText: Location very convenient, staff friendly and helpful and facilities were great.

partnerReply.reply: Dear Slavoljub, Thank you for sharing your feedback! We are glad you enjoyed our location and the vibrant neighbourhood. We are sorry to hear that the bathroom and bedding did not meet your expectations , your comments help us improve. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a more comfortable stay. Thank you. Best Regards, Anuja

textDetails.negativeText: Bathroom was so small that I barely fit in and I constantly hit my head there. It looks like an airplane lavatory. Bed and duvet are very small so it was a challenge to cover entire body.
textDetails.positiveText: It’s a very well located hotel in a lovely area. Proximity of the metro stations and plenty of bars and restaurants makes it a great solution for a central London stay.
textDetails.title: Not bad

textDetails.positiveText: i stayed one night in a shitty small singe room .. the second nigh i moved to a larger double room and it was great

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Brian, Thank you for sharing your kind feedback.

We are delighted that you enjoyed your clean room on the ground floor, our breakfast, and the friendliness and helpfulness of our staff. We are also pleased that you found our location convenient with several Tube stations nearby.

We look forward to welcoming you again and providing another enjoyable stay.

Kind Regards,
Jessica

textDetails.title: Recommend for anyone wanting a base to explore London.
textDetails.positiveText:
Nice clean room on the ground floor.
Very good breakfast.
Friendy helpful staff.
Close to several Tube stations.

textDetails.title: Modern and clean hotel, friendly staff, and good-sized rooms. Would stay again.
textDetails.positiveText: Modern, clean, friendly staff, good size rooms

partnerReply.reply:
Dear Andrew, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

We are delighted that you found our hotel modern and clean, and that you enjoyed the friendliness of our staff as well as the size of the rooms. Your kind words are greatly appreciated and motivate us to continue providing a high standard of service.

We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Warm Regards,
Jessica
